1376: Segher was born in Koe straet in 1376.
1382: Lost sibling Gherbaren in 1382 when Gherbaren was 3.
1384: Lost sibling Gobel in 1384 when Gobel was 8.
1390: Lost sibling Heillam in 1390 when Heillam was 16.
1392: Lost father at the age of 16.
1393: Lost mother at the age of 17.
Became caretaker of Sarre, Moys at age 18.
1397: Got married to Erkenradis at age 22 in 1397.
Segher moved to Helle voet.D.3 after marriage.
Moved in with wife Erkenradis after marriage.
1399: Had a daughter with Erkenradis, Hersewindis, at age 23.
